xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.19 Hetuduka, Atītārammaṇattika » 1.19.3 Paccuppannārammaṇapada » 1.19.3.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Atītārammaṇattika
Paccuppannārammaṇapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
507.
1132Hetu paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo hetussa paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
508.
1133Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1134Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1135Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1136(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
1137Hetudukaatītārammaṇattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< Hetvādiup1.20 Hetuduka, Ajjhattattika >>
